content: conundrum scarflette 1 conundrum scarflette a scarf or shawlette that may be made using any type of yarn and any size needle the design is reversible and is worked from one end to the other gauge does not matter choose a needle size that produces your preferred fabric for the scarflette shown above you will require - 125g/360 yards of rico creative reflection 4 ply 3 25 mm/us 3 needles abbreviations - k = knit yrn = yarn round needle yarn over needle creates a new stitch k2tog = knit 2 stitches together as one increase 1 = make one stitch by picking up the loop before the next stitch and knitting it ©hayley foord conundrum scarflette 2 instructions cast on 5 stitches tapered section row 1 k1 yarn round needle k2 together yarn round needle k2 6 stitches row 2 4 6 8 knit all stitches row 3 k2 yrn k2 together yrn k2 7 stitches row 5 k3 yrn k2tog yrn k2 8 stitches row 7 k4 yrn k2tog yrn k2 9 stitches row 9 k5 yrn k2tog yrn k2 10 stitches row 10 cast off or bind off if in us 5 stitches knit to end 5 stitches remain repeat these 10 row twice more there will be 3 points on the garment now pattern row *row 1 knit to the last 4 stitches increase 1 stitch knit to end row 2 knit to end row 3 5 7 9 11 knit to the last 4 stitches yrn k2tog yrn k2 row 4 6 8 10 knit to end row 12 cast off bind off 5 stitches knit to end ** these 12 row from * to ** form the pattern row and give an increase of one stitch after each point of the edging continue repeating these 12 row until your scarflette is half your required length the one i have made required an increase to 45 stitches this is the halfway mark decrease row row 1 knit to last 4 stitches k2tog k2 row 2 knit to end row 3 5 7 9 11 knit to the last 4 stitches yrn k2tog yrn k2 row 4 6 8 10 knit to end row 12 cast off bind off 5 stitches knit to end repeat these row until you are back to 5 stitches work the initial 10 row of the scarf to finish with 3 edging points as for the tapered section cast off bind off and sew in ends  ©hayley foord
